entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The sample instruction to build, test, and get code coverage for .NET libraries uses wrong folder #77642
  • The Jit does not add explicit null checks for zero-offset field addresses #77640
    8.0.0
  • The Jit doesn't handle certain uses of field addresses correctly #77636
    8.0.0
  • Don't delay call-counting-installation because of R2R'd code #77635
    8.0.0
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection Methods in .NET 6 Linux #77634
  • BigInteger.Log issues #77633
  • A module initializer will not be triggered when accessing a forwarded type #77632
  • [wasm] Test failing on nodejs - `SocketsHttpHandlerTest_HttpClientHandlerTest_Headers_Http11.ResponseHeaders_ExtraWhitespace_Trimmed` #77631
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `browser-eventpipe` sample broken with `PerfTracing` build - `JSExportAttribute' is only supported on: 'browser'` #77630
    8.0.0
  • LibraryImportGenerator does not respect C# 11 `scoped` modifier on parameters #77624
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Too many jump stubs #77638
  • Suggestion: Add RuntimeHelpers.IsDefaultComparable<T>() : bool #11035
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Proxy for HttpClient #77608
  • ILCompiler projects are causing source-build prebuilts #77601
  • Test failure readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism.sh #77298
    8.0.0
  • The mscordbi.dll is missing from symbol servers #77432
    8.0.0
  • global.json SDK version mismatch error message is obscure #77623
  • build-runtime.cmd on fresh clone fails #64156
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix #77642 to update instruction to build, test, and get code coverage result in code-coverage.md #77643
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add explicit null checks for zero-offset struct fields #77641
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Emit less jump-stubs on x64 #77639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extend ProcessStartInfo to allow setting LOGON_NETCREDENTIALS_ONLY #77637
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix non-standard modifiers of printf in GC #77627
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Remove libstdc++ dependency on NativeAOT-Android #77629
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Stop propagating BBF_SPLIT_FLAGS from inlinee's parent #77600
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete special-casing of .obj/.tlb (FILETYPE_NTOB/FILETYPE_TLB) #77626
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix source-build prebuilts introduced by analyzers #77607
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • [hot_reload] implement param reflection #77563
    area-EnC-mono
  • Switch CoreCLR WeakReference to unified managed implementation #77196
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [MONO][MARSHAL] Initialize ilgen with a flag #77448
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Initial support for unloadable ALCs #77399
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Fold bound checks for static readonly arrays/strings #77593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts (backport of #74504) #77508
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] source-build: support building runtime using non-portable runtime packages (backport of #75597) #77509
    community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Use generated runtime.json when building shared framework packages (backport of #76068) #77510
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix KeepNativeSymbols to work on mono as well (backport of #66594) #77506
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build (backport of #60675) #77505
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Define __cpuid{ex} only when there's no builtin one (backport of #73065) #77507
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • JIT: introduce some SSA accounting and checking #77055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes, do_jit_call, and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Run debugger tests with one work item per test class #77417
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove `palrt` from JIT and remove `memcpy` from PAL #77556
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Adding EVEX encoding logic for RR/AM pathways #77419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Fix Binding with IDictionary<,> implementer types #77582
    regression-from-last-release, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Use DOTNET_EnableCrashReport to create dumps #77578
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM: GT_ARR_LENGTH semantics #2061

PullRequests

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Turn on optimisation in RyuJit module, partial support for FIELD_LIST and lowering promoted fields #2007

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • global.json SDK version mismatch error message is obscure #28816

PullRequests

Updated

  • [release/6.0.1xx] ResolveReadyToRunCompilers: map non-portable rids when targetOS is determined (backport #28380) #28782
    Area-ReadyToRun

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Proposal: obsolete ISourceGenerator, SyntaxReceiver and all non-incremental APIs #65106
  • Cannot find references to generated method in hand-written source #65105

Closed

  • Easier way to create on-line help for analyzers #94
    Backlog
  • ServiceHub.RoslynCodeAnalysisService32.exe stays running after VS has been closed #17920
    Backlog
  • Get remaining IDE analyzers to run Out-of-process #13838
    Backlog
  • ErrorLogger need to be a public API #5456
    Backlog
  • Provide a way to disable a rule from the lightbulb and errorlist #6728
    Backlog
  • Allow concurrent analyzers to throttle concurrency in the presence of mutable state #7228
    Backlog
  • Allow ternary operator with same-signature method groups #26795
  • Make InsertFinalNewLine public #26483
    Backlog
  • Make GenerationOptions public #26482
    Backlog
  • Don't offer invertif in single line lambdas #26454
    Backlog
  • Decompilation does not support "collapse to definitions" #26436
    Backlog
  • C# invertif - some trivia on double parentheses is discarded #26427
    Backlog
  • Remove workaround from Invert If once issue is fixed #26402
    Backlog
  • How CodeActionOperation instances can be registered for processing by the UI thread? #26146
    Backlog
  • FAR on Reflection references #26069
    Backlog
  • [Feature] Language service for embedded JSON #25939
    Backlog
  • Possible race conditions in WeakReference<T>.SetTarget #25881
    Backlog
  • GoTo sometimes incorrectly completes with no results #25853
    Backlog
  • add TriviaTracker in SyntaxEditor or SyntaxGenerator #25844
    Backlog
  • use ValueTask in Roslyn #25843
    Backlog
  • Roslyn ignores IVSSymbolicNavigationNotify and IVSRefactorNotify for CPS projects #25784
    Backlog
  • Invertif on VB should work when subsequent block is an elseif #25434
    Backlog
  • If you choose "No" to the decompiler prompt, you get asked continually for every "Go To Definition" #25299
    Backlog
  • SQLitePersistentStorageTests.PersistentService_Document_WriteReadSameInstance failure #25114
    Backlog
  • Generate method picks Func<object> instead of Action #25110
    Backlog
  • [Completion] Need a way to add to override completion #25017
    Backlog
  • Find All References not working with var #24905
    Backlog
  • Go To All : Include Go To Recent Files #24878
    Backlog
  • Unexpected overload used for completion in incomplete code #24841
    Backlog
  • Exception on Go To Definition in WPF InitializeComponent() #24568
    Backlog
  • Editor jump bar doesn't go to correct location for multiple conflicting functions #24515
    Backlog
  • Slow response when editing #24481
    Backlog
  • show users why find all reference can't read metadata information #24459
    Backlog
  • Refactor NavigateTo tests to remove duplicate code #24318
    Backlog
  • Workspace: investigate and design multiple solutions side-by-side #24218
    Backlog
  • Allow collapsing of multi-line verbatim strings #24056
    Backlog
  • [Feature Request] Offer to capture a method/property that is repeatedly invoked in a local variable #24008
    Backlog
  • blend crash when on foreach #23939
    Compiler.Next
  • Turn expression-body for methods off by default #23934
    Backlog
  • Unable to disable Roslyn lightbulb #23885
    Backlog
  • Add using operation should prefer top-level using directive #23586
    Backlog
  • UI delay after solution load when registering workspace #23449
    Backlog
  • SyntaxFactory.Literal(double) sometimes doesn't create double literals #23403
    Backlog
  • tuple Intellisense [very trivial] #23388
    Backlog
  • IDE editor inserts extra '#endif' when applying IDE0018 "Variable declaration can be inlined" #23387
    Backlog
  • Generate a linear serializer for compilation units #23331
    Backlog
  • Null check can be simplified produces code with compilation error #23320
    Backlog
  • "Go to file member" keyboard shortcut #23294
    Backlog
  • change Workspace.LogTestMessage not to create string when not needed #23245
    Backlog
  • IOperation missing IsExpression / IsStatement #23219
    Backlog
  • Two CodeProviders have same names #23218
    Backlog
  • Rename dashboard cross button doesn't look like a cross #22892
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Additional ref fields tests #65107
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Update code to use range operator #65104
    Area-IDE

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #65110
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #65109
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Do not insert equals and colon if the are already present #65090
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Semantic Snippets - try catch snippet #65101
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Visual Studio 2022 Template "ASP.NET Core Web App" converts hyphens to underscores in _Layout.cshtml css href, causing 404 on the css when debug/run. #44787
  • Blazor - Razor File - Renaming Injected Service Name Not Working in VS2022 17.3.6 #44786
  • [Blazor] CustomElement affects the results of MarkupString #44785

Closed

  • Blazor Webassembly .dll files cannot be downloaded #44784
  • Securing a SPA by Identityserver 6 before first load in .NET 6 #43452
    Discussions
  • Problem details of headers and query parameters are reported as fields #44683
  • [Minimal API] Http methods overload #44746
  • Blazor WASM integrity check failed behind corporate proxy (Zscaller) #44782
  • More granular tests for `TryParseQualityDouble` #2710
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add more granular tests for HeaderUtilities.TryParseQualityDouble #44574
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Support side-by-side transports in Kestrel #44657
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] source-build: support building aspnetcore using non-portable runtime packages (backport #43937) #44752
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2032312 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Set ApiParameterDescription.Type to `string` for Simple Types #44747
    area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • App Manifest Validation Error: The attribute 'ShortName' with value '*' failed to parse. #10994
  • Shell TabBar displays huge images (ios/macos) #10993
  • Clicking with a mouse will make it impossible to change focus by code #10992
  • Serious issue with Dotnet MAUI iOS -- > Bitcode is deprecated when publishing app to appstore #10989
  • Attached methods of layouts should take IView parameter instead of BindableObject #10988
  • Editor HorizontalTextAlignment Does not Works. #10987

Closed

  • loading app to phone in debug mode #10837

PullRequests

Created

  • Add HttpClient factory for UriImageSource #10995
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10985
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Update Editor.cs To solve HorizontalTextAlignment problem #10981
    community ✨
  • Validate image format before resize in Resizetizer #9986
    t/bug, area/single project ☝️, .NET 7 + Servicing

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The naming convention of custom foreign keys and shadow attributes conflicts. Types that can be null cannot be null during migration #29452
